title: Development of a Digital Education Design Model for Medical Graduate Schools

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in Basic Medical Terminology and Academic Research Skills
context.additional_context: A non-degree graduate medical school program conducted in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Learners can explain three evidence-based design principles when utilizing digital educational tools
Learners can apply seven out of nine stages of the PGMDE model to actual instructional design
Learners can establish two or more effective online learning strategies in smartphone-based environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
